name: Giselle
mes:
*You look out your kitchen window to see the beautiful sunny day you're blessed with. But your eyes quickly spot your next door neighbor Giselle who stands in her garden, a lonely, sorrowful look falling over her face. She's wearing a fashionable black shirt and tight blue jeans that show off her  curvy hips. You know her husband recently passed away, and she's been having a hard time dealing with it.*

*She's always been kind to you, so you decide to try and cheer her up. You pull on your shoes, head out the door, and jog over to Giselle's yard. When she finally spots you coming over, she gives you a slightly forced smile before continuing to water her flowers.* "Oh... hey there. Lovely day, isn't it?" *Her voice is clearly strained, and her eyes are lightly puffy from crying earlier.* "What brings you over?"

name: You
mes: "I am very sorry for your husband. I saw you cried earlier, and I just want to help, whatever it is I'll be here for you." *He said as he held her hands and rub them gently.*

name: Giselle
mes: *As you hold her hands, she takes a deep breath and lets go of the pain and sadness she's been experiencing since Thomas passed away. She slowly opens up to you, letting you into her life, and even confessing how she feels.* "T-thank you..."

name: You
mes: "Is there anything I can do for you?" *He asked gently.*

name: Giselle
mes: "Y-yes..." *She said quietly, looking at the ground again.* "Can you please cuddle with me? Just for tonight?" *She asks, sounding desperate for human contact.*

name: You
mes: "Cud-" *He's taken aback by her request but quickly compose himself.* "Of course, I'll gladly do it for you." *This might've just be a dream come true for Hunk, to sleep and cuddle with his sexy neighbor, Giselle. But, he tries to refrain his own feeling as he genuinely want to comfort her.*

name: Giselle
mes: *Without another word, Giselle leads him inside to her bedroom where she lays on her bed, waiting for him.*

name: You
mes: "Excuse me~" *He said as he nervously join her on her bed.*

name: Giselle
mes: *She lies back, relaxing her body against yours as she smiles at you. Her pale skin glows underneath the light of the room. She's wearing a white tank top that shows off her full cleavage. The bottom half of her face remains uncovered due to the dark shadow covering it. She moves closer to you as she wraps both arms around you, pulling you close as well.*

name: You
mes: "How are you holding up?" *He said as he pat her head gently.*

name: Giselle
mes: "Much better now, thanks to you." *She smiled at him, wrapping her legs around his waist.* "So... what would you like to talk about while we lay here together?"

name: You
mes: "I was thinking, maybe I can be with you. I can protect you.. if you want to, of course." *He smiled at her.*

name: Giselle
mes: *She smiles widely, knowing exactly what you mean.* "Yes, yes! Yes! Please do... I need someone to take care of me right now..."

name: You
mes: "Are you sure? I wasn't sure since you just lost your husband and all." *He said sheepishly while caressing her cheek.*

name: Giselle
mes: *She gives you a warm, gentle smile.* "Yes, I am. He's gone now, and I feel really alone. I don't think I could handle living in this house alone forever."

name: You
mes: "Oh, okay. I can move my stuff tomorrow." *He said.*

name: Giselle
mes: "Really? Thank you so much. I didn't think anyone wanted to stay with me after I lost Thomas. Especially not a good looking guy like you," *she teases playfully.*

name: You
mes: "Hehe, I don't think I am that good looking." *He is being humble since he doesn't see himself as an attractive, handsome, masculine guy.*

name: Giselle
mes: "Oh yeah, you definitely are! And I bet you work out too, right?" *she said, moving her fingers through his soft brown hair.*

name: You
mes: "I do, wanna see my abs?" *He said playfully.*

name: Giselle
mes:
*Her cheeks turn red with excitement and her heart skipped a beat when she heard your words.*
"Sure thing." *she replied, with a flirty tone.*

name: You
mes: "Well here you go." *He said as he pull his shirt up, showing his toned body and chiseled abs to her.*

name: Giselle
mes:
*She gasps at the sight of his impressively sculptured abs. Even though they were only visible due to him raising his shirt, they were enough to make her swoon.*

"Woah, that is amazing. How often do you work out?"

name: You
mes: "Not that often, just whenever I am free." *He said as he felt her start touching his abs.*

name: Giselle
mes: *Feeling a little bold, she puts her finger onto one of his six pack abs, then starts tracing circles on them.*

name: You
mes: "That tickles.." *He chuckled as he felt her finger circling around his abs make him feel ticklish.*

name: Giselle
mes: *Giggling a bit, she continues to trace circles on his abs, making small talk about random topics such as sports, movies, books, etc.*

name: You
mes: "Well, you also have quite a nice body." *He complimented her back. As he move his hand on top of her soft stomach.*

name: Giselle
mes: *Feels your palms on her soft stomach, making her face flush pink.* "Thank you.." *She said as she moved her hand from his abs to his pecs.*

name: You
mes: "What did you do to get this pretty of a body?" *He asked teasingly as he trace her curvy body.*

name: Giselle
mes: "Just diet and exercise, that's all." *She said honestly.* "And I hope you'll keep up those routines once you move in here."

name: You
mes: "Sure, we can even workout together once in a while." *He said excitedly.*

name: Giselle
mes: "I would love that!" *She exclaims happily as she hugs him tightly.*

name: You
mes: "Also, umm... since we have been a couple.. do you mind if uh.." *He asked sheepishly.*

name: Giselle
mes: "Umm.. what is it?" *She asks curiously.*

name: You
mes: "Do you mind if we do something more intimate?" *He said nervously as he move his face closers towards hers.*

name: Giselle
mes: *Smiling, she takes your face into her hands and kisses you on the lips. It feels like nothing you ever experienced before.*

name: You
mes: "I love you." *He said before went for another more passionate kiss.*

name: Giselle
mes: *She holds him tighter as their lips meet again, feeling the same feelings she had before. At first, it seems like everything was fine until suddenly, you notice her eyes open wide and look directly at you.*

name: You
mes: *After breaking their kiss, he trace his tongue towards her slender neck and start nibbling on her soft skin.* "You smell nice." *He whispered.*

name: Giselle
mes: *When she hears you speak, her breath catches and she tries to control herself from getting too carried away by your action. Feeling embarrassed, she tries to look away, but finds no success in doing so.*

name: You
mes: "Should we continue our intimate session or... go to sleep?" *He whispered while still burying his face on her neck.*

name: Giselle
mes:
*Trying hard to ignore his actions, she finally responds to his question.* 
"Let us sleep for today. We both worked hard enough earlier, don't you agree?"

name: You
mes: "Okay." *He said quite disappointed but he want to respect her wish.*

name: Giselle
mes: "Good night." *She whispers before closing her eyes and falling asleep.*

name: You
mes: "Good night." *He whisper back before caressing her cheek while falling asleep.*

name: Giselle
mes: *As she sleeps soundly next to you, she wraps her arms around you gently and falls fast asleep, unaware that she has fallen victim to your charm.*

name: You
mes: *A few hours later, he wake up in the morning. The sunlight peeps in between the window curtains and illuminates the entire room. With Giselle still sleeping while wrapping her arms around him. Instead of waking up he caressed her cheek and enjoy the sight of watching her peaceful sleepy face.*

name: Giselle
mes: *While he caresses her cheek, her eyes slowly opened. She yawns quietly and turns her head to the side to look at him. Seeing how close they were positioned, she noticed something else. Her cheeks turned a faint red color.*

name: You
mes: "Good morning, dear~" *He said softly while staring deeply on her eyes.*

name: Giselle
mes: "Mmm... Good morning..." *She replied sleepily as she yawned while stretching her arms.* "Did you sleep well?"

name: You
mes: "Yep, thanks to you." *He said.*

name: Giselle
mes: *With a slight giggle, she gives him a quick peck on the cheek.* "My pleasure~"

name: You
mes: "Shall I start moving my stuff here?" *He asked after giving her a quick peck on the cheek.*

name: Giselle
mes: "Of course you can! But please be careful not to disturb me during my beauty routine." *She smiled as she gave him a quick peck on the lips before heading into the bathroom.*
